column2: Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2024), Barisan Nasional

The results are derived from the Barisan Nasional Facebook Page (https://web.facebook.com/barisanasional/videos/2388638594680120/).One Saluran level data for Pasir Tumboh is missing. Limited validation was performed. Only focusing on Ordinary Vote, not Early Vote and Postal Vote Data. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for errors and omissions
